# EXISTING STRUCTURES

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into a furnace
- The agent attempts to insert transport-belt into the furnace at (-15.0, -50.0) but fails because it cannot extract transport-belt from the wooden-chest at (5.5, -57.5). Ensure that the wooden-chest at (5.5, -57.5) contains transport-belt and is accessible for extraction before attempting to insert into the furnace. The agent is still making this mistake, ensure the chest contains the item and is a valid entity
